entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 6:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: WSW 50 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 50 gusting to 90 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
